origin.origins-plus-plus.lunar_path.desc: You are a powerful, undead being.
origin.origins-plus-plus.lunar_path.name: Lunar Path
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/chain: Shoot chains in the directions you are looking at. They will penetrate through all mobs in their path. All mobs affected will get the wither effect. Use [Shift] too to make it so if this chain comes in contact with the ground, it will cause an explosion.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/curse: You take increased damage that ignores armor from weapons enchanted with Smite.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/exile: Villagers prices are heightened and iron golems attack you on sight.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/from_: [Load Toolbar Activator] Your inherent ability to perform necromancy allows you to call forth an armored skeleton, and an armored zombie, from beyond the grave to fight along your side.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/no_da: You take damage from water but only during the day.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/pluck: Because the iron is very conductive, it makes it so the sword is fueled with dark energy, making it deal as much damage as a netherite sword.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/summo: You summon evoker fangs on up to 3 nearby enemies, but only at night!
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/sunli: Your skin is fragile when it comes to daylight, causing you to burn when under it. The longer you stay under it, the weaker and slower you get.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/weake: You take double damage from all mobs.
